thread.title: WATCH: Aboubakar wins AFCON for Cameroon with incredible strike
thread.title_full: WATCH: Aboubakar wins AFCON for Cameroon with incredible strike

title: WATCH: Aboubakar wins AFCON for Cameroon with incredible strike
text:
Feb 5, 2017 4:11:22 PM The Cameroon striker flipped the ball over his defender before burying the 88th-minute winner. 
Vincent Aboubakar didn't just win the Africa Cup of Nations for Cameroon — he did it in style. 
With Cameroon and Egypt tied late in Sunday's AFCON final, the Besitkas forward stepped up with a brilliant 88th-minute strike to give the Indomitable Lions a 2-1 win. 
Collecting a hopeful long ball at the top of Egypt's penalty area, Aboubakar flicked the ball over the head of defender Ali Gabr before volleying a bouncing shot inside the far post. 
With the win, Cameroon booked its ticket to this summer's Confederations Cup in Russia. THAT SECOND TOUCH The Curse of Cuper lives on.... Watch LIVE via PPV on YouTube: https://t.co/IA7H6upI5I https://t.co/dQ3eSeBRmh — beIN SPORTS USA (@beINSPORTSUSA) February 5, 2017 Related
